tool.name: splitFile
tool.description: Generates fasta formatted sequence files for near full sequences and fragments

param.name: per
param.label: Threshold length for fragments (% of maximum length)

tool.help:
**Note**
This tool accepts a fasta formatted sequence file and splits it into two separate fasta formatted files.
The first file contains all the sequences that have lengths less than the threshold (% of the maximum length in the file) and are called fragments.
The second file contains all the remaining sequences (long sequences, full length sequences and references).
